H0.text: What is another name for shingles. Herpes

H1.text: What is another name for shingles. Varicella

H2.text: What is another name for shingles. Poxvirus

H3.text: What is another name for shingles. Zoster

A4.text: Shingles, also known as herpes zoster or zona, is a viral disease characterized by a painful skin rash with blisters in a localized area.

A5.text: The causative agent for shingles is the varicella zoster virus (VZV)â€”a double-stranded DNA virus related to the herpes simplex virus.
